achievements.name: TF_PLAY_GAME_EVERYCLASS
achievements.description: Play a complete round with every class.

achievements.name: TF_PLAY_GAME_EVERYMAP
achievements.description: Play a complete game on 2Fort, Dustbowl, Granary, Gravel Pit, Hydro, and Well (CP).

achievements.name: TF_GET_HEALPOINTS
achievements.description: Accumulate 25000 heal points as a Medic.

achievements.name: TF_BURN_PLAYERSINMINIMUMTIME
achievements.description: Set five enemies on fire in 30 seconds.

achievements.name: TF_GET_TURRETKILLS
achievements.description: Accumulate 10 sentry gun kills with a single sentry.

achievements.name: TF_KILL_NEMESIS
achievements.description: Get five revenge kills.

achievements.name: TF_GET_CONSECUTIVEKILLS_NODEATHS
achievements.description: Get five kills in a row without dying.

achievements.name: TF_GET_HEALED_BYENEMY
achievements.description: Trick an opposing Medic into healing you.

achievements.name: TF_PLAY_GAME_FRIENDSONLY
achievements.description: Play in a game with 7 or more players from your Friends list.

achievements.name: TF_WIN_MULTIPLEGAMES
achievements.description: Win 20 games.

achievements.name: TF_GET_MULTIPLEKILLS
achievements.description: Accumulate 1000 total kills.

achievements.name: TF_GET_HEADSHOTS
achievements.description: Get 25 headshots as a Sniper.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_TOP_SCOREBOARD
achievements.description: Play a full round without killing any enemies, and score the highest on a team of 6 or more players.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_UNDER_FIRE
achievements.description: Heal a teammate who's taking fire from 4 enemies at once.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SIMUL_CHARGE
achievements.description: Work with 2 other Medics to deploy 3 simultaneous ÜberCharges.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SETUP_CHARGE
achievements.description: Have an ÜberCharge ready before the Setup phase ends.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_RAPID_CHARGE
achievements.description: Deploy 3 ÜberCharges in less than 5 minutes, and assist in 5 kills during that time.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_COUNTER_CHARGE
achievements.description: Deploy an ÜberCharge within 8 seconds of a nearby enemy Medic deploying his.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SWITCH_TO_MEDIC
achievements.description: In a team with no Medics, be the first person to switch to Medic after a teammate calls for 'Medic!', and then heal 500 health.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SAVE_TEAMMATE
achievements.description: Deploy an ÜberCharge on a teammate less than a second before they're hit by a critical explosive.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_CHARGE_BLOCKER
achievements.description: Block the enemy from capturing a control point with an ÜberCharged teammate.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_MEDIC
achievements.description: Assist a fellow Medic in killing 3 enemies in a single life.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SYRINGE_SCOUTS
achievements.displayName: Does It Hurt When I Do This?
achievements.description: Kill 50 Scouts with your syringe gun.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_BONESAW_MEDICS
achievements.description: Kill 10 Medics with your bone saw.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_HEAVY_LONG
achievements.description: Assist a Heavy in killing 10 enemies, where neither of you die.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_SCOUT
achievements.description: Assist in killing 3 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Scout.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_PYRO
achievements.description: Assist in burning 5 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Pyro.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_HEAVY
achievements.description: Assist in punching 2 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Heavy.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_DEMOMAN
achievements.description: Assist in destroying 5 enemy Engineer buildings with a single ÜberCharge on a Demoman.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_ENGINEER
achievements.description: Heal an Engineer as he repairs his sentry gun while it's under enemy fire.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_CAPTURER
achievements.description: Assist in killing 3 enemies on an enemy control point, in a single life.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_CALLERS
achievements.description: Heal 200 teammates after they've called for 'Medic!'.

achievements.name: TF_WIN_2FORT_NOENEMYCAPS
achievements.description: Win 2Fort with a shutout.

achievements.name: TF_WIN_WELL_MINIMUMTIME
achievements.description: Win Well in 5 minutes or less.

achievements.name: TF_WIN_HYDRO_NOENEMYCAPS
achievements.description: Win Hydro without giving up a capture.

achievements.name: TF_WIN_DUSTBOWL_NOENEMYCAPS
achievements.description: Successfully defend Dustbowl without giving up a capture.

achievements.name: TF_WIN_GRAVELPIT_NOENEMYCAPS
achievements.description: Successfully defend Gravel Pit without giving up a capture.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_EXTINGUISH_TEAMMATES
achievements.description: Extinguish 100 burning teammates.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_VS_NEMESES
achievements.description: Assist in killing 20 nemeses.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_KILL_WHILE_CHARGED
achievements.description: Kill 2 enemies in a single life, while having your ÜberCharge ready, but undeployed.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_BONESAW_NOMISSES
achievements.description: Hit enemies with your bonesaw 5 times in a row without dying or missing.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_LARGE
achievements.description: Accumulate 7000 heal points in a single life.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_HUGE
achievements.description: Accumulate 10000 heal points health in a single life.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_GRIND
achievements.description: Accumulate 1 million total heal points.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_KILL_HEALED_SPY
achievements.description: Kill an enemy Spy that you have been healing.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SAVE_FALLING_TEAMMATE
achievements.description: Save a falling teammate from dying on impact.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_CHARGE_JUGGLE
achievements.description: ÜberCharge 2 teammates at once.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_FREEZECAM_RAGDOLL
achievements.description: Provide an enemy with a freezecam shot of you taunting above their ragdoll.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_BONESAW_SPY_CALLERS
achievements.description: Use your bonesaw to kill a spy who has been calling for 'Medic!'.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_CHARGE_FRIENDS
achievements.description: ÜberCharge 5 of your Steam Community Friends.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_INVITE_JOIN_CHARGE
achievements.description: Join a game that one of your friends is in and then deploy an ÜberCharge on him.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_ACHIEVER
achievements.description: Be healing a teammate as he achieves an achievement of his own.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_SOLDIER
achievements.description: Assist in exploding 5 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Soldier.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ACHIEVE_PROGRESS1
achievements.description: Achieve 10 of the achievements in the Medic pack.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ACHIEVE_PROGRESS2
achievements.description: Achieve 16 of the achievements in the Medic pack.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ACHIEVE_PROGRESS3
achievements.description: Achieve 22 of the achievements in the Medic pack.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_MULTIWEAPONS
achievements.description: Use your shotgun to finish off 20 players you've ignited.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_SIMULBURN_SCOUTS
achievements.description: Have 2 enemy Scouts on fire at the same time.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_FORCE_WATERJUMP
achievements.description: Force 10 burning enemies to jump into water.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_POSTDEATH
achievements.description: Kill 15 players while you're dead.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_SPIES
achievements.description: Ignite 5 Spies who have a sapper on a friendly building.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_CARRIERS
achievements.description: Ignite 5 enemies carrying your intelligence.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_REVEAL_SPIES
achievements.description: Ignite 10 cloaked Spies.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_CAMP_TELEPORTERS
achievements.description: Ignite 10 enemies that have recently used a teleporter.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_CAMP_POSITION
achievements.description: Kill 3 enemies in a row, all within the same area.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_AXE_SMALL
achievements.description: Kill 3 people with your axe in one life.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_AXE_LARGE
achievements.description: Kill 6 people with your axe in one life.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_BURN_SPIES_AS_YOU
achievements.description: Ignite 10 disguised Spies.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_BURN_SNIPERS_ZOOMED
achievements.description: Ignite 10 Snipers while they are zoomed in.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_BURN_MEDICS_CHARGED
achievements.description: Ignite 3 Medics that are ready to deploy an ÜberCharge.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_HEAVIES
achievements.description: Kill 50 Heavies with your flamethrower.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_UNDERWATER
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies while you're both underwater.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_UBERCHARGE
achievements.description: Kill 3 enemies in a single ÜberCharge.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_DESTROY_BUILDINGS
achievements.description: Destroy 50 Engineer buildings.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_DEFEND_POINTS
achievements.description: Ignite 50 enemies capturing one of your control points.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_GRIND
achievements.description: Kill 500 enemies.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_DAMAGE_GRIND
achievements.description: Do 1 million points of total fire damage.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_TAUNT
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with a taunt.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_BURN_SPY_TAUNT
achievements.description: Ignite an enemy Spy while he's flicking a cigarette.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_DOMINATE_LEAVESVR
achievements.description: Cause a dominated player to leave the server.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_TAUNTERS
achievements.description: Kill 3 enemies while they're taunting.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_BURN_RJ_SOLDIER
achievements.description: Ignite a rocket-jumping Soldier while he's in midair.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_FREEZECAM_TAUNTS
achievements.description: Provide enemies with freezecam shots of each of your taunts.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_BURN_MEDICPAIR
achievements.description: Ignite an enemy, and the Medic healing him.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_FROM_BEHIND
achievements.description: Kill 50 enemies with your flamethrower, from behind.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_TEAMWORK
achievements.description: Kill a burning enemy who was ignited by another Pyro.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_REFLECT_CROCKET_KILL
achievements.description: Kill a Soldier with a reflected critical rocket.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_KILL_GRIND_LARGE
achievements.description: Kill 1000 enemies.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_IGNITE_FLAREGUN
achievements.description: Ignite 100 enemies with the flare gun.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_REFLECT_PROJECTILES
achievements.description: Reflect 100 projectiles with your compressed air blast.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_DOUBLE_KO
achievements.description: Kill an enemy in the same second that he kills you.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_ACHIEVE_PROGRESS1
achievements.description: Achieve 10 of the achievements in the Pyro pack.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_ACHIEVE_PROGRESS2
achievements.description: Achieve 16 of the achievements in the Pyro pack.

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_ACHIEVE_PROGRESS3
achievements.description: Achieve 22 of the achievements in the Pyro pack.

achievements.description: Achieve 10 of the achievements in the Heavy pack.

achievements.description: Achieve 16 of the achievements in the Heavy pack.

achievements.description: Achieve 22 of the achievements in the Heavy pack.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_DAMAGE_TAKEN
achievements.description: Take 1000 points of damage in a single life.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_DEFEND_MEDIC
achievements.description: Kill 50 enemies within 3 seconds of them attacking your Medic.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_ASSIST_MEDIC_LARGE
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies with a Medic assisting you, where neither of you die.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_EARN_MEDIC_DOMINATION
achievements.description: Earn a domination for a Medic who's healing you.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_KILL_TAUNT
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with a taunt.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_KILL_FLAG_CARRIERS
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies carrying your intelligence.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_KILL_MEDIC_PAIR
achievements.description: Work with a friendly Medic to kill an enemy Heavy & Medic pair.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_BLOCK_INVULN_HEAVY
achievements.description: While invulnerable and on defense, block an invulnerable enemy Heavy's movement.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_BLOCK_CART
achievements.description: Block the enemy from moving the payload cart 25 times.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_RECEIVE_UBER_GRIND
achievements.description: Get ÜberCharged 50 times.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_STAND_NEAR_DISPENSER
achievements.description: Kill 20 enemies while being recharged by a dispenser.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_ASSIST_HEAVY_GRIND
achievements.description: Get 25 enemy kills where you either assist or are assisted by another Heavy.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_CLEAR_STICKYBOMBS
achievements.description: Remove 20 stickybombs by killing the Demomen who produced them.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_KILL_UNDERWATER
achievements.description: Kill 50 enemies while both you and your victim are underwater.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_TAKE_MULTI_DAMAGE
achievements.description: In a single life, get shot, burned, bludgeoned, and receive explosive damage.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_SURVIVE_CROCKET
achievements.description: Survive a direct hit from a critical rocket.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_ASSIST_GRIND
achievements.description: Get 1000 assists.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_UNCOVER_SPIES
achievements.description: Kill or assist in killing 10 cloaked Spies.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_KILL_WHILE_SPUNUP
achievements.description: Kill 5 enemies without spinning down your gun.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_FIRE_LOTS
achievements.description: Fire $200,000 worth of minigun rounds in a single life.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_KILL_CRIT_PUNCH
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with a critical punch.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_HEAL_MEDIKITS
achievements.description: Heal 1000 damage with med-kits in a single life.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_KILL_SHOTGUN
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with your shotgun while you're out of minigun ammo.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_FIRST_TO_CAP
achievements.description: Be the first on your team to start capturing a control point in a round.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_PAYLOAD_CAP_GRIND
achievements.description: Get 50 caps on payload maps.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_KILL_MIDAIR_MINIGUN
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies in mid-air with the minigun.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_DEFEND_CONTROL_POINT
achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies while you're standing on a control point you own.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_KILL_CAPPING_ENEMIES
achievements.description: Kill 15 enemies capturing a control point you own.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_REVENGE_ASSIST
achievements.description: Help 5 teammates get revenge on their nemeses.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_TELEPORT_FAST_KILL
achievements.description: Kill an enemy in the first 5 seconds after you exit a teleporter.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_FREEZECAM_TAUNT
achievements.description: Provide an enemy with a freezecam shot of you taunting while invulnerable.

achievements.name: TF_HEAVY_EAT_SANDWICHES
achievements.description: Eat 100 sandviches.
